item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, December 3, 2024 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Lessons I learned working at an art gallery (248 points | 79 comments)
2. Company claims 1k% price hike drove it from VMware to open source rival (116 points | 110 comments)
3. The rise of digital housekeeping: the hidden work of smart technology (18 points | discuss)
4. Raspberry Pi boosts Pi 5 performance with SDRAM tuning (186 points | 111 comments)

8. Wasmer (YC S19) Is Hiring a SRE and DevOps Engineer in Europe ( | hide)
9. No need to email me about Cisco AnyConnect (158 points | 45 comments)

23. Bioluminescent wood using the white rot fungus desarmillaria tabescens (107 points | 25 comments)

25. 8 months of OCaml after 8 years of Haskell in production (2023) (225 points | 188 comments)
26. A better approach to gravity: how we made EGM2008 faster (71 points | 19 comments)
27. Ask HN: Who wants to be hired? (December 2024) (131 points | 283 comments)
28. Optimality of Gerver's Sofa (108 points | 31 comments)
29. Intel announces retirement of Pat Gelsinger (860 points | 674 comments)
